subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Alfonso Soriano homered twice and the Yankees scored 14 runs, their most since April 9, to end a laborious game for C. C. Sabathia, who walked six batters in six-plus innings.
snippet: Alfonso Soriano homered twice and the Yankees scored 14 runs, their most since April 9, to end a laborious game for C. C. Sabathia, who walked six batters in six-plus innings.
